Employment

LearnChamp Consulting GmbH | 2020-08-01 - Today

Senior Full Stack Engineer

As a Senior Full Stack Engineer at LearnChamp my responsiblities were technical product development, improvement to processes and introducing new tools into the company.
  • Planning and implementation of customerspecific integration solutions
  • Internal development for r&d projects (AR/VR, chatbots, automatic testing,...)

LearnChamp Consulting GmbH | 2017-06-01 - 2020-08-01

IT Lead & Solution Architect

As an IT Lead at LearnChamp I took over the responsibility for our whole infrastructure. This included the physical hardware for our datacenter and the equipment for our employees. I was also tasked with maintenance and improvement of the virtual server landscape. During this time I was manager of a two person team. One working in desktop support and the other working on our linux infrastructure. I was able to improve and broaden my knowledge on multiple topics.
  • Consulting and conception of solution architectures based on customer-specific requirements
  • Design and implementation of a hosting solution in AWS
  • Overall support of the internal IT infrastructure (Windows server, Linux server (Debian), VMWare, Veeam, Atlassian Cloud, Nextcloud on-premise, Gitlab on-premise)
  • Supervision of desktop support staff (3rd level); development of scripts for software distribution; support of an asset management solution (Lansweeper); Rollout O365
  • Conception and implementation of a devops strategy
  • Development of integration solutions to internal systems
  • Support of the second location in Germany

LearnChamp Consulting GmbH | 2014-01-01 - 2017-06-01

Technical Consultant

During my time at LearnChamp, integrations between different (cloud) products in customer projects were always in demand. As an experienced developer, I took on these tasks. I also started working in IT here and after the first year I was in charge of all support staff and our Linux infrastructure.
  • Design and implementation of customer-specific integration solutions

LearnChamp Consulting GmbH | 2012-11-01 - 2013-12-01

Associate

In this role, I was able to implement web programming within the Totara LMS. This ranged from front-end creation of *themes* to new plugins and integrations with third-party systems.
  • Implementation of custom designs for the LMS Totara
  • Implementation of customizations for the LMS Totara
  • Configuration of the LMS and ongoing customer support

nexxar GmbH | 2010 - 2010

Web development intern

My tasks consisted of creating pixel-perfect implementations of digital business reports. The focus here was very much on performance and compatibility with a large number of browsers / browser versions.
  • Implementation of customized designs as digital business reports
